embeds.title: Wisteria
embeds.description:
Hi, I'm Wisteria.

 I was introduced to the platform through Project Croissant and over the last several years I have been an active support member for Brunch, the community driven project for installing ChromeOS to regular PCs. You can usually find me lurking about in the support channel!

 I've been a digital illustrator for over a decade, but these days I spend my evenings raiding in Final Fantasy XIV.
